products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow roller blind in yellow. Made to measure from 13.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The warm, golden hues of this roller blind will definitely catch the eye! Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it's a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1976 fabric colour: summer yellow material: 3 ply vinyl, 1 ply fibreglass lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind

products.productdescription:
The warm, golden hues of this electric roller blind will definitely catch the eye! Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, its a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.
